items.title: 3D Modeling: Learn creating assets in Blender
items.headline: An highly engaging project based course to learn modeling and creating 3D assets using Blender
objectives_summary: At the end of this project based course, the students will be able to create assets such as a Can, Chocolate Cube, Cactus, Chair, Screw and 6 more assets. They will be able to learn the tools in blender while learning to create the projects as elucidated in the course.
They will also be able to follow the animation industry’s standardized process for creating models which are ready for texturing, rigging and animation.
